src:
Kuskus z zelenjavo
Priprava kuskusa je hitra in preprosta; lahko je priloga, solata ali glavna jed, celo v sladki kombinaciji s sadjem.
06 Nov 2019, 10:18 by A. K.
Kombinacija sadja in zelenjave pa tudi mesa se pojavlja v številnih jedeh, v današnjem receptu smo dodali lahek, a nasiten kuskus. Priprava slednjega je hitra in enostavna, le poparimo ga z vodo in počakamo, da se zrna napnejo. Potem ga zmešamo z najrazličnejšimi dodatki, podobno kot riž ali kaše.Za 4 osebe:1 skodelica kuskusa1 zelena paprika1 pest češnjevih paradižnikov1 čebula1 bučka1 večje granatno jabolkosol, oljčno olje, sveži peteršilj1 limonaZelenjavo operemo in očistimo, paradižnik, bučke in papriko narežemo na koščke, čebulo sesekljamo. Granatno jabolko prerežemo in izločimo semena. Na olju svetlo prepražimo čebulo in dodamo zelenjavo. Pražimo na močnem ognju, hitro, da zelenjava ostane čvrsta, solimo. Medtem po navodilih pripravimo kuskus in ga primešamo zelenjavi. Dodamo semena granatnega jabolka in drobno nasekljan svež peteršilj, okrasimo z rezinami limone. Jed lahko ponudimo tudi hladno, kot solato.Lahko ga naredimo tudi na sladko, z narezanim svežim, kuhanim ali suhim sadjem. Za pest ali dve koščkov sadja lahko primešamo celo k slani jedi iz kuskusa, odlično se obnese jagodičje, pa tudi semena oziroma zrna granatnega jabolka.

Couscous with vegetables
Couscous preparation is quick and easy; it can be a side dish, salad or main course, even in a sweet combination with fruit.
06 Nov 2019, 10:18 by A.K.
The combination of fruits and vegetables, as well as meat, comes in many dishes, and today’s recipe has added light but saturated couscous. Preparation of the latter is quick and easy, just boil it with water and wait for the grains to strain. Then mix it with a variety of additives, like rice or cashews.For 4 people: 1 cup couscous1 green pepper1 cherry tomato fist1 onion1 zucchini1 larger pomegranate, olive oil, fresh parsley1 lemon, peel and peel, peel chop the onions. The pomegranate is cut and the seeds are eliminated. Lightly fry the onions in the oil and add the vegetables. Roast over high heat, quickly to keep the vegetables firm, salt. Meanwhile, prepare the couscous according to the instructions and mix it with the vegetables. Add pomegranate seeds and finely chopped fresh parsley, garnish with slices of lemon. The dish can also be served cold as a salad. It can also be made sweet, with fresh, cooked or dried fruit sliced. For a handful or two of fruit, you can even mix in a salty dish of couscous, it tastes great with berries, as well as pomegranate seeds and grains.
